name: Product Discount for Woocommerce
author: Spark Coder

sections.description:
Product discount manager plugin helps to apply discounts to WooCommerce products quickly & Price Changing. Manage product discount manageer very easily from admin dashboard.
Just install and go ahead and add your discount deals based on any specified parameters, in a matter of minutes.

You can set discounts for products and product variations, simple product, category discount. You can also set discounts based on categories and Change Products Price easily.

Key features:

  • Apply discount to products, based on your existing categories.
  • Apply discount to products, based on your Product Type like simple, variable, variation etc.
  • Apply discount to products, based on percentage and fixed amount.
  • Apply / Remove discount to products with a single click, even to thousands of products.
  • Add/ Remove discount settings easily with single click.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.

  1. Go to Plugins in the Admin menu
  2. Click on the button Add new
  3. Search for Product discount manager and click Install Now
  4. Click on the Activate plugin

You can also do it Manually.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Note : Before activating/installing this plugin, please ensure that you have installed and activated the WooCommerce plugin.
sections.faq:
Can i use this plugin free?

Yes, You can use it free.

Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  2. Discount Settings Options

  3. Created Discount Settings

  4. Price Changing Options
